metadata.title: CVE-2024-6607 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: It was possible to prevent a user from exiting pointerlock when pressingescape and to overlay customValidity notifications from a `<select>`element over certain permission prompts. This could be used to confuse auser into giving a site unintended permissions. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 128 and Thunderbird < 128.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
